column1: Here's the list of microservices derived from the modular monolith requirements:

column2: User registration; User authentication; Password hashing and salting; Session management
Serves web front end; Delivers registration/login pages; Routes requests to appropriate services; Manages user sessions
column3: User Service; Media Service; File Storage Service

column2: Coordinates media operations; Processes download requests; Manages audio file metadata; Handles upload requests
column3: File Storage Service; Watermarking Service; Packaging Service; Database Service

column2: Digitally watermarks audio files; Re-encodes files before watermarking
Converts audio files to different bit rates; Reduces file sizes
Archives multiple audio files into single compressed files; Handles bulk downloads
Stores and retrieves audio files; Physical file storage management
column3: Media Service; Watermarking Service; Re-encoding Service; Packaging Service

column2: Stores user information; Stores audio file metadata; Handles database queries
